content: loops of 2nd st of final round in this case it will be the corner chain pull yarn through and insert needle back into last st of round don t pull too tight the loop created in the join should be the same size as your other sts and will replace the top loops of the first st of the round weave in ends securely i hope you have enjoyed following this tutorial please respect the work it has taken to create this pattern for you and do not sell on copy or otherwise share these instructions in any way you may sell items made from this pattern but you must use your own photos of your own work in all advertising and other sales materials you are not permitted to use any of my photos and you are not permitted to add my charts or written instructions in full or in part to pinterest or any other social media sites if you wish to share the pattern you may do so only by linking to the original documents in my website or ravelry / etsy / love crafts shop as applicable rosina contact hello@rosinacrochets uk 7 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com
